channel.title: CVE Feed for pimcore -- admin-ui-classic-bundle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pimcore -- admin-ui-classic-bundle

item.title: CVE-2023-37280|2024-10-23T15:18:40.802Z -- pimcore -- admin-ui-classic-bundle
item.description: Pimcore Admin Classic Bundle provides a Backend UI for Pimcore based on the ExtJS framework. An admin who has not setup two factor authentication before is vulnerable for this attack, without need for any form of privilege, causing the application to execute arbitrary scripts/HTML content. This vulnerability has been patched in version 1.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-41109|2024-08-02T04:46:52.472Z -- pimcore -- admin-ui-classic-bundle
item.description: Pimcore's Admin Classic Bundle provides a backend user interface for Pimcore. Navigating to `/admin/index/statistics` with a logged in Pimcore user exposes information about the Pimcore installation, PHP version, MYSQL version, installed bundles and all database tables and their row count in the system. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.5.2, 1.4.6, and 1.3.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-41109|2024-07-30T14:43:14.407Z -- pimcore -- admin-ui-classic-bundle

Navigating to `/admin/index/statistics` with a logged in Pimcore user exposes information about the Pimcore installation, PHP version, MYSQL version, installed bundles and all database tables and their row count in the system.
